document_data.name: Scribes' Friendship
document_data.mainbody: The '''Scribes' Friendship''' was the guildhall for the scribes of the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located at the intersection of [[Rogar Alley]] and the [[High Road (Daggerford)|High Road]] near the center of Daggerford.
